This looks a bit like operation flashpoint.. same developers:

witch crack files?

the crack is in the crack directory on the mounted/burned cd. Copy this crack into the \vbs1\bin installation directory. Overwrite the old vbs1.bin. Then start the game up with vbs.bat or vbs1preferences.exe.
thanks  do you have any addons to the game?

Yes I have the addons. The problem is, I cant get them working with this cracked version. When I install them in this version the game crashes on start-up. 
So there has to be made a new crack to get the addons working. I cant code cracks but ive been searching around a lot for a workaround and have been testing a bit myself. But still no success. I'll report when i find something. As far as I know no one got the addons working with the cracked version.

cheers,
I was just wondering if you've figured out a way to get the addons to work with VBS1. Thanks

@gangwe,

No sorry. It's a mission impossible for me at least to get the addons working. I tried some things but im not a crack coder. I didnt see other people on the internet who got it working. Maybe it will be done sometime in the future by someone. I hope so. Vbs1 without addons is pretty boring.

is there an vbs2 torrent?

eh possibly a lil late on this one, but if you dig around on the net you can find a program called de-pbo or un pbo, and use it to make any addon taken from OFP, into an addon usable in vbs1...the addons you can get in torrents wont work because they're encrypted files in the PBO's, so if you wasted time downloading the msi files you're S.O.L. without the marx drivers you cant use them, and with the marx drivers you cant use vbs1 without the key....at least you can use the addons from ofp tho.

I have never seen an addon for this game in the internet. The policy of BIA is very strict is this case, and, of course, the encryption does help a lot to prevent their distribution. However, it would be really rewarding to have them, since they include most of the game content.

One more thing: It is most likely You will find VBS2 etc on a usenet filesharing service. I have seen some files on bintube lately.

Still, has anyone seen VBS1 addons in the wild?

Yeah, I've downloaded VBS2 and it's working great without trojans or something. But its only with UK units.
Can someone upload all addons (ADF,USMC...)?
Greetz
